questions.question: Why do you think Stick is always gone when Sam wakes up in the morning?

choices.answer: He's serving free breakfast with the Black Panthers.
He's out working at Dunkin' Doughnuts.
He's on his paper route.
He's doing his morning meditation.

questions.question: What is the people's reaction to MLK's death?

choices.answer: They dance in the streets.
The cry deeply.
They sing funeral dirges.
They riot and burn stores.

questions.question: Who wakes up Sam at the crack of dawn after MLK gets assassinated?

choices.answer: Father
Stick
Mama
Maxie

questions.question: What does Sam mean when he says, "They weren't in the same car.  They weren't even on the same road"?

choices.answer: Literally they were in different cars.
Stick always takes the bus to avoid his father.
Figuratively they are on very different paths.
Father can't drive because of epilepsy so Stick does.

questions.question: Sam's response to being invited to a Black Panthers' meeting?

choices.answer: Flat out refuses because he hates them.
Wants to go.
Is scared to go, but can't chicken out because of Maxie.
Politely declines.

questions.question: What is Father's reaction to Stick becoming a Black Panther?

choices.answer: He says, "Not in my house!"
He cries while hugging him in joy.
The two men get in a fist fight.
He laughs in his face.

questions.question: Stick and Father disagree on whether or not they have a choice.  What do they mean?

choices.answer: An argument on taxation.
An argument on needing a job in life.
An argument on needing to breathe.
An argument on do the ends justify the means?

questions.question: At this point I predict Sam would most likely follow...

choices.answer: Dr. Reverend Martin Luther King Jr.
Malcolm X and the Nation of Islam
Huey Newton and the Black Panthers
Sam follows no man and sets his own path.

questions.question: Sam says he joined the rioting because...

choices.answer: He was tired of being treated like a little kid.
He didn't know why.  It felt less bad than doing nothing.
Because he wanted in with the cool kids.
Sam didn't join in the rioting.

questions.question: What doesn't Maxie have at her house?

choices.answer: A phone.
Electricity.
A gun.
Black Panthers' magazines.

questions.question: What is Father's reaction to Stick leaving?

choices.answer: He cussed him out while yelling.
He didn't care at all.
He just read the newspaper.
He cried.

questions.question: At this point if I were the protagonist, I would most likely follow...

choices.answer: Dr. Reverend Martin Luther King Jr.
Malcolm X and the Nation of Islam.
Huey Newton and the Black Panthers.
Follow?  I would lead those leaders.
